text: Yemwe bantu! Nimutinye Nyagasani wanyu, munatinye umunsi umubyeyi atazagira icyo amarira umwana we, cyangwa ngo umwana agire icyo amarira umubyeyi we. Mu by’ukuri, isezerano rya Allah ni ukuri. Bityo ubuzima bw’isi ntibuzabashuke cyangwa ngo umushukanyi mukuru (Shitani) abashuke abakura mu nzira ya Allah
